EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify Farm VIP Event Managers of a cancelation
EmailTemplate.name: Farm VIP Reg: Canceled
EmailTemplate.subject: Cancelation for {!Farm_VIP_Registration__c.Registrant__c} to {!Farm_VIP_Registration__c.Farm_VIP_Event__c} Awaiting Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The approved Farm VIP nomination for {!Farm_VIP_Registration__c.Registrant__c} from {!Farm_VIP_Registration__c.Customer_Name__c} for the {!Farm_VIP_Registration__c.Farm_VIP_Event__c} has been canceled.
Link to record: {!Farm_VIP_Registration__c.Link}
